name: Breadly's Grandma Rescue
storyline: As per usual aliens are trying to kidnap grandma, luckily Breadly is coming to the rescue. To rescue her he must find her first, so he'll have to yell near the houses to make her come out. The aliens will chase Breadly when they spot him so stay out of their sight or make sure to run away. Yelling and running cost stamina so be careful how and when you run or yell!
summary: An indie action game that strives to balance fun, being annoyed and things that don't make sense.
